findings.title: Unprotected constructor
findings.description: The constructor of a contract is unprotected, allowing anyone to call it and potentially causing unintended behavior.

findings.title: Unprotected receive Ether function
findings.description: The smart contract has an unprotected function to receive Ether, which can lead to unauthorized fund transfers.

findings.title: Unprotected totalSupply function
findings.description: The totalSupply function lacks protection, potentially allowing unauthorized access or manipulation.

findings.title: Unprotected decimals function
findings.description: The decimals function is declared as external and does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access.

findings.title: Unprotected symbol function
findings.description: The symbol function can be modified by external users.

findings.title: Unprotected name function
findings.description: The 'name' function is unprotected and can be modified by anyone.

findings.title: Unprotected getOwner function
findings.description: The smart contract owner does not utilize ownable.sol, which means the ownership cannot be renounced or transferred.

findings.title: Unprotected allowance function
findings.description: The allowance function is declared as external and does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access.

findings.title: Unprotected approve function
findings.description: The approve function allows unlimited approval of tokens without any restrictions.

findings.title: Unprotected approveMax function
findings.description: The approveMax function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected transfer function
findings.description: The 'transfer' function allows unauthorized transfers of tokens, potentially leading to asset loss.

findings.title: Unprotected transferFrom function
findings.description: The transferFrom function is not properly protected, allowing unauthorized access and potential token theft.

findings.title: Unprotected updateFeesDivisor function
findings.description: The updateFeesDivisor function lacks access control or protection, allowing unauthorized users to modify the fees divisor.

findings.title: Unprotected updateSwapTokensAt function
findings.description: The updateSwapTokensAt function is unprotected and can be called by anyone.

findings.title: Unprotected updateSwapEnabled function
findings.description: The updateSwapEnabled function lacks protection, potentially allowing unauthorized access or manipulation.

findings.title: Unprotected updateWalletMax function
findings.description: The updateWalletMax function is unprotected and can be exploited by non-whitelisted wallets to hold a specified number of tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected updateTransactionMax function
findings.description: The updateTransactionMax function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected calcTotalFees function
findings.description: The calcTotalFees function is unprotected and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unprotected updateRewardFee function
findings.description: The updateRewardFee function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected updateMarketingFee function
findings.description: The updateMarketingFee function is unprotected and can be called by anyone.

findings.title: Unprotected updateDevFee function
findings.description: The updateDevFee function is unprotected and can be called by anyone, potentially allowing unauthorized changes to the dev fee.

findings.title: Unprotected updateMarketingWallet function
findings.description: The updateMarketingWallet function is unprotected and can be called by anyone, potentially allowing unauthorized updates to the marketing wallet.

findings.title: Unprotected updateDevWallet function
findings.description: The updateDevWallet function is unprotected and can be called by anyone, potentially allowing unauthorized updates to the dev wallet.

findings.title: Unprotected updateMarketingPortionOfSwap function
findings.description: The updateMarketingPortionOfSwap function is unprotected and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized changes.

findings.title: Unprotected updateDevPortionOfSwap function
findings.description: The updateDevPortionOfSwap function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected prepareForPreSale function
findings.description: The prepareForPreSale function is declared as external and lacks access control, making it vulnerable to unauthorized calls.

findings.title: Unprotected setDistributionCriteria function
findings.description: The setDistributionCriteria function is unprotected and can be accessed by unauthorized users.

findings.title: Unprotected setShare function
findings.description: The setShare function is unprotected and can be accessed by anyone.

findings.title: Unprotected deposit function
findings.description: The deposit function is declared as external and does not have any access modifiers, making it accessible by anyone.

findings.title: Unprotected process function
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Unprotected shouldDistribute function
findings.description: The internal function shouldDistribute lacks access control, making it vulnerable to unauthorized calls.

findings.title: Unprotected distributeDividend function
findings.description: The distributeDividend function is unprotected and can be exploited by unauthorized users.

findings.title: Unprotected claimDividend function
findings.description: The claimDividend function is declared as external and lacks any access control modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized calls.

findings.title: Unprotected getUnpaidEarnings function
findings.description: The getUnpaidEarnings function is unprotected and can be accessed by anyone.

findings.title: Unprotected getCumulativeDividends function
findings.description: The internal function getCumulativeDividends is unprotected and can be accessed by anyone.

findings.title: Unprotected addShareholder function
findings.description: The addShareholder function lacks access control, allowing unauthorized users to add shareholders.

findings.title: Unprotected removeShareholder function
findings.description: The removeShareholder function is internal and lacks access control, allowing unauthorized users to remove shareholders.

findings.title: Unprotected TransferDividendToken function
findings.description: The TransferDividendToken function lacks protection, allowing unauthorized access and potential exploitation.

findings.title: Unprotected TransferStuckBNB function
findings.description: The TransferStuckBNB function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.
